ygData.subject: Re: About the items...
ygData.msgSnippet: apparently you have never done any quests in Everquest. here is the formula: give player quest at level x (lets say 6 for an example) make player kill mob of
ygData.messageBody:
apparently you have never done any quests in Everquest.
here is the formula:
give player quest at level x (lets say 6 for an example)
make player kill mob of level foo (lets say 18)
player turns in item off mob for reward bar (level 4 spell)

You think I am just making this stuff up?
Its the tergons spellbook quest.
/nosferatu
